name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple Weight Converter - Pound and Kilogram

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enter numbers to convert to lb or kg

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you you to quickly and easily convert from pounds to kilograms and vice versa. As you are entering numbers, the other unit type will automatically update with the correct conversion.
